description: An easy midweek dinner packed full of veggies. This recipe only uses one pot, making it easy to make and clean up.
name: Savoury Mince Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Cook onion and carrot, stirring, for 8 minutes or until softened. Increase heat to high. Add mince and cook, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until mince has browned.
Add remaining ingredients and 3 cups water, then bring to a boil. Reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer, uncovered, for 25 minutes or until pasta is cooked. Season and serve.
